channel.title: Version History on
channel.description: Recent content in Version History on

item.title: ðŸ”¨ 1.4.1 2022-08-17
item.description: [1.4.1] - 2022-08-17 # Added # Ticket Report SIM report SIM warranty feature Report bonus points to agents Fixed # Map: Display style list of devices by group, geographical area Review the color display route by speed Device Management: Add installation signal management Optimized alert configuration Optimizing extended configuration parameters Department: Add configuration to receive notifications for departments Ticket:

item.title: ðŸ”¨ 1.4.0 2022-07-05
item.description: [1.4.0] - 2022-07-05 # Add new Add Ticket . report Optimal Map: Fixed display of geofence name when - Change zoom Added display style Horizontal Icons Department: Add configuration to receive notifications for departments Tickets: Fix showing ticket list with account not showing account tree Support search by sub-account Map API key: Add type of api key GoTrack - VN Beta Warning rules: Add warning to stop turning on the air conditioner.

item.title: ðŸ”¨ 1.3.9 2022-06-21
item.description: [1.3.9] - 2022-06-21 # Add new SIM card warranty: Additional warranty sim module SIM management: Added SIM report and renewal fee Change Map configuration: Allows to configure the display area Show marker preview Map: Display geofence name with zoom level >= 11 Device info box: Added on/off sensor type display Fix sensor: Additional type of on/off sensor Optimal History - Change device: Allow searching by sub-account.

item.title: ðŸ”¨ 1.3.8 2022-06-10
item.description: [1.3.8] - 2022-06-10 # Add new Sim management: Add sim and charge report Trading report: Installation activities Device Information: Support quick search information by imei for technical support Change Trading report: Grouping business reports into 1 page Menu interface: Add top menu layout interface Optimal Map page: Fix the display of map settings and display information Fixed the bug of enabling/disabling the full map.

item.title: ðŸ”¨ 1.3.7 2022-06-02
item.description: [1.3.7] - 2022-06-02 # Add new Trading report: Transaction summary Summary of transactions - GPS Transaction summary - Camera Transaction Summary - Addon Status statistics Change Infobox: Hide service term display Camera: Show error if any and update time Device search: Show service term Equipment management : Added ccid display (default to hide) Optimal Fixed a bug where the vehicle status color was displayed according to the map interface Menu interface-2: fix selected menu color error

item.title: ðŸ”¨ 1.3.6 2022-05-30
item.description: [1.3.6] - 2022-05-30 # Add new Map configuration: Allow - Change icon size : small, medium, large Allows speed on and off Infobox: Add service term information Show status color for other data Order : Add summary column by order status - equipment Added Borrow order type Service management: Add data transfer type, Change Report - Update on device: Show more information Hardware Version and Extended Data Sim management: Optimize the display panel Activate sim: default is 12 months Menus: Change the base color of the menu Allows pinning up to 5 pages Optimal Equipment management : Fixed a bug showing service term < 30 days Checking devices: Add RFID check function, Hardware-version Optimize the display panel Add test command for GoTrack device type that supports quick test User-tree: Fix clear user Datatable: Fix content overflow on display table.

item.title: ðŸ”¨ 1.3.5 2022-05-07
item.description: [1.3.5] - 2022-05-07 # Add new Added 2FA login feature Add the feature to create notifications sent to users Change Camera - Live View: Optimize display list Transaction history: Show more executors Optimal Camera management: Fix the error Change service pack Equipment management: Fix the error Fix the service limit

item.title: ðŸ”¨ 1.3.4 2022-04-29
item.description: [1.3.4] - 2022-04-29 # Add new Additional features for Warranty, Manufacturing Add email management feature Change Account tree: Optimized display name instead of account List of devices: Added search by license plate and sim number Rename the Other Data report to Predictive Data Daily summary report: Add totals Optimal Fix the error of synthesizing Address comments Map page: Optimize device list loading Operation history: Fix display and pagination errors Order sending history: Optimize display interface Fuel chart: Fix display error Review the route: Fixed data table loss of signal

item.title: ðŸ”¨ 1.3.3 2022-04-04
item.description: [1.3.3] - 2022-04-04 # Add new Device info box: Add Address Comment button Change Move report Photo History and Photo List to Reports > Camera Camera > Image monitoring: Automatically download the latest photos Accounts with the default VN User role use the basic address Optimal Map page: Fixed a bug in the map display when the device went from Running to Stop state

item.title: ðŸ”¨ 1.3.2 2022-03-25
item.description: [1.3.2] - 2022-03-25 # Add new Release feature to use points for device and camera services Camera management page: add grace period, switch camera Additional service expansion Add management page for business Change Send command: Add a command to quickly sync license plates
